Topic.Title: How do I give the player starting items?

Posts.EditableText: Title says it all really. I want my player to start with items already in their inventory, how would I do that?
Posts.HTML: Title says it all really. I want my player to start with items already in their inventory, how would I do that?

Posts.EditableText: When you're editing an object, you can use the "move" button to change where it starts. Just put it in the player object.
Posts.HTML: When you're editing an object, you can use the "move" button to change where it starts. Just put it in the player object.

Posts.EditableText:
Or...
start the player in a room where the starting objects are.
have a exit to the start of the game...
To make it interesting, they can't take everything, but need to select what they start with.
Some will help, and some will not.
